About D-BAS-SearchÂ¶

D-BAS-Search is a microservice designed for D-BAS.

This microservice is designed to work with Elasticsearch and Docker.

D-BAS-Search provides a text search for D-BAS.

The search supports:

  • Synonym Search
  • Fuzzy Search
  • Full Text Search

Check the out for more details.
